name: MEDACC
description: Medical Accounting Services (MEDACC) is a leading agency providing debt recovery, outsourced invoicing, credit control and skip trace services to Private and NHS hospitals, Consultants and other Medical Practitioners. MEDACC also provides World Wide Trace Investigations. If you require debt recovery services and are looking for a unique high quality debt collection agency with additional services then explore our web site to discover how MEDACC can cost effectively help you.
